title: The league illegal. Wherein the late Solemn League and Covenant is seriously examined, scholastically and solidly confuted: for the right informing of weak and tender consciences, and the undeceiving of the erroneous. Written long since in prison, by Daniel Featley D.D. and never until now made known to the world. Published by John Faireclough, vulg√≤ Featley, chaplain to the Kings most Excellent Majesty.
author: Featley, Daniel, 1582-1645.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for R. Royston at the Angel in Ivy-lane,
